title: What Summs For Yasuo?
body:
Hi,

Can someone tell me what Summoners you would take on Yasuo and why? I take ignite and flash, but recently watching youtubers they take exhaust and flash.

Thanks

replies.body: I can really say much for bronze but I do have yasuo on rank 5 so I have played him quite a bit. I generally take flash ignite most of the time but in situations where your against a hard matchup and a really mobile champ flash exhaust is what I go for ;)

Exhaust vs Assassins/Burst mages.

Ignite vs Healers or lanes u can kill or for basically every other lane, however if you are going to get trashed Teleport is also good (IE vs LeBlanc) however Ignite if you have the right team comp (A good jungler that can pull off ganks) or even exhaust if you are going to get trashed but will be able to get engages later in the game even if you cant CS a lot early.

Same goes for basically any Champ but with new itemisation most AP can get away with ignite now instead of exhaust (Zhonya's/Abyssal are better atm).

Teleport is pretty strong though as an AP vs a mid laner who wants to kill you /play aggressive or vs Assassins or just champs like Annie etc that aren't particularly great at pushing or need to kill you to carry.

Barrier and heal are used sometimes too - Heal if the enemy laner isn't going to take ignite, barrier if they are - but when you want to be able to play defensive/aggressive or engage and deal with a burst with barrier/defend to deal with a burst with barrier. (Also to help against ganks).
If you're a really skilled Yasuo. I recommend Ignite and Exhaust, Or even Exhaust and Flash. But if you're starting out or just alright at him I recommend Flash and Ignite. Hope it helps :)

thats the funny part, the best yasuo's still like to take their Ignite+flash combo's, they will only ever take exhaust over ignite if they are in a losing lane, such as vs a zed or annie, as they are at a clear disadvantage without it. When vs people yasuo has a massive advantage over or "heavily counters" they will take ignite to help snowball. This "ignite/exhaust" garbage is for the people who saw a yasuo take it in a **1v1** and thought it would be practical in a 5v5 situation

Everyone takes Ignite and Flash cause that was the big thing to do when he first came out and still is I think is a little better. I take Ignite against Zed cause a skilled Yasuo will know how to out play and out trade a Zed, sure it's hard but I do it many of times. And Zed does come out on top sometimes, and Annie.. Well Annie isn't exactly the most balanced champ with her one click shots haha {{champion:157}}
